scripts.prestart: cd server && npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && (sleep 5 & npm run seed:all)
scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.prune: concurrently "cd client && npm prune" "cd server && npm prune"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
